nodes.name: Ownable

nodes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferOwnership

nodes.name: ProjectContract

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The project closing date musst be farther then the funding clsoing date"

arguments.value: The project closing date musst be farther then the funding clsoing date

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The project closing date musst be farther then the funding clsoing date"

nodes.documentation:
@notice Returns the State of the Contract. The Contract can be in one of five States:
1. The Contract was initilized and the creator can add backing option -> INITILIZED
2. The Contract is open and investors can invest. The goal was not reached jet and there is still time to the deadline -> ACTIVE
3. The funding Goal was reached, but there is still time till the deadline -> FUNDINGGOALREACHED
4. The deadline has ended and the funding goal was reached -> DEADLINEREACHED
5. The deadline has ended and the funding goal was not reached -> DEADLINEREACHEDREFUND
nodes.name: getContractState

voteForCurrentRequest

nodes.documentation:
@notice This function will tell if the investor has voted for the current request.
It returns
0 (ACCEPTED) if the investor has accepted the current request,
1 (REJECTED) if the investor has rejected the current request,
2 (NOVOTEGIVEN) if the investor has not voted jet.
nodes.name: hasInvestorVotedForCurrentRequest
